Car Importing Business Mobile Website Designe

If you want to download this template and edit it in Figma, click the link underneatht the image to begin the download process.

Download

About This Template

This is a mobile website design for a car importing/importer business.

 Kei cars are the smallest category of vehicles sold in Japan. The word 'Kei' translates to 'Light Automobile' in Japanese.

Kei cars specifically Kei trucks are small work utility vehicles that becoming increasingly popular in the US especially among rural populations.

Some of the reasons Kei Trucks are becoming more popular in America include their work use practicality, their fuel efficiency, & their low cost of maintenance. 

I've noticed a lot of people buying these and figured that using a Kei Truck would be fitting for this type of business and design.

To make this I took inspiration from automotive website designs I found online along with some personal knowledge about the type of information you want to see when your shopping for cars online and this is what I came up with.

I spent a few hours designing the layout and spend another hour or two making the logo look as cool as possible.  I used 'League gothic' for the big 'IMPORTER' text on top and translated 'car imported' to Japanese text and placed it right underneath.

Free Website Design Resources

This is a free web design resources I made. If you like it please feel free to download it and use at your will. Also please consider linking to my website if you're going to use it for commercial purposes.
